By Foster on Sunday, September 3, 2000 - 12:11 pm:

ok,.. after perusing through the ideas, I think that I have to say that there are a few good choice ones in there,..

we all know that they will have new monsters, so I will not bring up any of those,.. tey are all good suggestions, (except mabye that gyrados one,.... tsk tsk,.. pokemon???).

I think that some of the best suggestions are
1.that the freezer should be adaptded onto the memory card itself,.. for the unlimited storage possibility. ---Dark Phoenix
2.that you should be allowed to go inside of your house ---benj
3.the ability to buy items in bulk ---Dark Phoenix
4.an "evaluation" shop in town ---Trickster
5.the ability to choose your partner ---Nobody

ok,... lol, not that any of the other ideas were not valid, but i just think that these could be more important to the content and gameplay of a new one.. any others?????
